document.full_text: piroska nagy said the liaison was consensual but she had felt coerced because mr. strauss-kahn was so senior to her, a person with direct knowledge of the affair said.
document.title: woman in 2008 affair is said to have accused i.m.f. director of coercing her
lines_and_colors: piroska nagy said the liaison was consensual but she had felt coerced because mr. strauss-kahn was so senior to her, a person with direct knowledge of the affair said.
